reviewText: The series aired on Speed TV and was a winner from start to finish. The classic footage is a must for any racing fan and having Dale Jr. as the host was an angle that worked well. This is an outstanding DVD that merges the old-school with a new-school swagger.
Title: Back in the Day with Dale Jr. - The Complete Season One

reviewText: This is great. I enjoy watching the old races and reading the pop-ups.
Title: Back in the Day with Dale Jr. - The Complete Season One

reviewText: Little E lets fans see what NASCAR was like back in the day.  Classic racing and great drivers.
Title: Back in the Day with Dale Jr. - The Complete Season One

reviewText: If you are a vintage Grand National/Winston/Nextel cup NASCAR fan this is a must!!
Title: Back in the Day with Dale Jr. - The Complete Season One

reviewText: THIS IS A TREMENDOUS VIDEO SERIES. THE RACES ARE PUT TOGETHER VERY WELL AND THE OLD RACES ARE TRMENDOUS. I HOPE WE SEE A SEASON 2,3,4.....
Title: Back in the Day with Dale Jr. - The Complete Season One
